Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.observer

Interface ViewObserver

All Known Subinterfaces:
View
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClientCLI, ClientGUI
public interface ViewObserver
This interface implements the Observer-side of the client paradigm. The class that implements it, has to redefine each method adding View-update procedures.
